verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
I shall not be,
I shall not be moved;

I shall not be,
I shall not be moved;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Just like a tree that’s planted by the waters,
Lord, I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Jesus is my Saviour,
I shall not be moved;

In His love and favor,
I shall not be moved,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Just like a tree that’s planted by the waters,
Lord, I shall not be moved

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
In my Christ abiding,
I shall not be moved;

In His love I’m hiding,
I shall not be moved,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: Just like a tree that’s planted by the waters,
Lord, I shall not be moved

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
If I trust Him ever,
I shall not be moved;

He will fail me never,
I shall not be moved,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: Just like a tree that’s planted by the waters,
Lord, I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
On His word I’m feeding,
I shall not be moved;

He’s the One that’s leading,
I shall not be moved,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines: Just like a tree that’s planted by the waters,
Lord, I shall not be moved.
